pages.text: A version of the Fanged Dagger that, while no longer venomous, will heal the wielder 5%% of damage dealt by it. The lifesteal percentage increases with each Soul Eater enchantment level.
The dagger can be repaired on an anvil with a $(l:crafts/dark_metal_ingot)Dark Metal Ingot$(), though it will self repair if the wielder has Soul Energy.
